class_notes:
This course is entirely online and will meet synchronously both days.


This is the required foundational course for all degree programs in the Department of Political Science, including political science, international studies, public policy and analysis, math and political science, as well as political concentrations in the QSS major. This course also satisfies an Emory general education requirement. The course does not have prerequisites and is designed to equip students with the background and tools they need to take advanced courses in all degree programs.
course_description: The course is organized around the following questions:  What is politics, and what is political science? How do political groups form? How do groups make decisions? How are group decisions implemented? We approach these questions using ideas that are found across the sub-fields of political science.
